channel.title: Gears of War 3
channel.description:
Interview with Bleszinski: [url]https://www.latenightwithjimmyfallon.com/blogs/2010/04/gears-of-war-3-video-game-world-premiere-trailer-ashes-to-ashes/[/url] Gears 3 Trailer: [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hCYbEFe32z8[/url]
[img]https://image.com.com/gamespot/images/2010/101/gears3_lady_22850_screen.jpg[/img] [img]https://image.com.com/gamespot/images/2010/101/gears3_dom_96493_screen.jpg[/img]
Keep it in here.

item.title: Gears of War 3
item.dc:creator: Deimos
item.description:
I played and enjoyed the first Gears Of War coop with a mate on PC, but after finishing it kinda just uninstalled it and forgot about it; if i can get my hands on a 360 before release i will do the same with this one. (Without the uninstalling stuff of course)

Read full topic

item.title: Gears of War 3
item.dc:creator: jackbency
item.description:
I must say a five player co-op Gears of War would be some sweet action. I still love Gears of war 1,2 because It is too adventures Game. I am sure that Gears of war also would be great.

Read full topic

item.title: Gears of War 3
item.dc:creator: mrfohlin
item.description:
JohnKiller118:

Now sure how Gears of War 3 will turn out, though, since we know absolutely nothing about the game.

We are going to find the happy kitten land with lots of colors and pink unicorns!
Then we are going to sit in a circle and sing with the locust.

Read full topic

item.title: Gears of War 3
item.dc:creator: JohnKiller118
item.description:
jackbency:

Gears of War 3 looks like Halo: Reach is going to raise those graphic standards on consoles

fix’d

Though to be fair, most “omg graphics games”, no matter the platform, suck ass. At least Halo: Reach has some awesome new additions (ie open world, gametype specific loadouts, some parts of the singleplayer are playable using while using stealth tactics, new multiplayer modes, major gameplay differences between SPARTANS and Elites etc.)

Now sure how Gears of War 3 will turn out, though, since we know absolutely nothing about the game.

Read full topic

item.title: Gears of War 3
item.dc:creator: MechUnit
item.description:
Hazzmat:

I really hope they will release it for the PC.

i don’t think so because they also didn’t do a PC conversion of Gears of War 2… so if they would make GoW 3 for PC they also got to build GoW 2. otherwise an important part of the story would be missing for the PC gamers wo don’t know GoW 2. it’s becuase the whole story is a trilogy, for example like the lord of the rings movies or Halo 1 to 3 (another reason why it was a bad idea to convert (only) Halo 2 to the PC). another reason why i don’t think that Epic would do a PC conversion is just that GoW 1 didn’t sell much copies on the PC but on XBOX 360 it broke records with the amount of selled copies.

Omega_Absolute:

Well, 4 player co-op has already been confirmed.

cool thing!

Read full topic

item.title: Gears of War 3
item.dc:creator: jackbency
item.description:
Gears of War 3 looks like Halo: Reach is going to raise those graphic standards, too. I Loved both the Gears games, so I am very much happy to hear this. Gears of War 3 gonna be great, all I want is 4 player co-op.

Read full topic

item.title: Gears of War 3
item.dc:creator: JohnKiller118
item.description:
SURPLUS_NiNjA:

I really hope Dom doesn’t have a beard because of the cliche, “oh i am too depressed to shave after my wife died”

My hope is that the game will take place so long after Gears of War 2 that, while you can still tell who’s who, they’re barely recognizable because of how much things changed since the end of 2. Like how Anya is apparently a COG soldier.
It’ll be like how in Metal Gear Solid 4, where the last time you saw Meryl in the first game, she was a rookie. Now 10 years later, she’s commanding Rat Patrol 01.

But I wouldn’t be surprised if the whole “o im too depressed to shave after my wife died” would be the case. Epic does have a nag for action film clichés.

Read full topic

The head developer of the game or the head of the studio will not ever make a GoW for the pc because of the so called ‘pirating’. Its not fear for me, a non xbox 360 user :’( :’(

I really hope they will release it for the PC.

item.title: Gears of War 3
item.dc:creator: MechUnit
item.description:
JohnKiller118:

wat?

He just got older and grew a bigger beard.

Anyway, hopefully when they introduce new characters, they won’t drop them at the end of the first act never to be seen again i[/i], or not seen since the end of the first act then later returns only to shoot himself in the head.

And a related note, remember how epic Cole Train’s return in Gears of War 2 was?
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iSd6i1vdVMc
I loved that scene!

oh, this is Dom? i really didn’t recnogize him… yes, the appearance of Cole in GoW 2 was really epic.

Read full topic

item.title: Gears of War 3
item.dc:creator: Ajax
item.description:
If I watched the trailer correctly, it looked like Cole and Baird were in it in the background. I saw Baird clearly, but the two shots I thought I saw Cole it, he looked different…in one it looked like he was wearing a do-rag, and the other he wasn’t wearing anything, and it didn’t look much like him. Might not have been Cole, though…

I certainly hope they don’t kill off Cole or Baird. I like them.

Read full topic

item.title: Gears of War 3
item.dc:creator: JohnKiller118
item.description:
MechUnit:

but we didn’t see Dom in the trailer

wat?

He just got older and grew a bigger beard.

Anyway, hopefully when they introduce new characters, they won’t drop them at the end of the first act never to be seen again i[/i], or not seen since the end of the first act then later returns only to shoot himself in the head.

And a related note, remember how epic Cole Train’s return in Gears of War 2 was?
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iSd6i1vdVMc

item.title: Gears of War 3
item.dc:creator: MechUnit
item.description:
oh yes! can’t wait until april 2011! the new features are sounding very intereseting and it will surely do one thing again: Gears of War 3 will rock again!

but we didn’t see Dom in the trailer… oO i hope the whole got old team will be featured again… Dom, Cole Train, Baird… Dom surely will but without the others i would miss something.
